txt.en: This rare piece of skarn contains an abundance of Minas Ithil ore, which can be smelted by experienced Minas Ithil Prospectors.\n\nHigh-quality skarn contains pure Minas Ithil ore, which can be extracted and used in some Minas Ithil Jeweller, Metalsmith, Prospector, and Weaponsmith recipes to increase the chance of critical success.
